title: Text dialogue on text
content:
Hi,

I have difficulty to find this text dialogue on phone, could you give me a hand, thanks!

Keith

Font: 

 Duty Light 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317105701/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

author: keithluc

comments.content: You image resolution it's a bit low and can't be sure, but it looks like **[Duty (Light)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317105701/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=T-26%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Duty%20-%20Light&fid=353b24f0dec670ee69121255da8574ef&fsize=48&text=Missing%20you.%20Wish%20you%20were%20here.&wrap=2)** by T-26
